resources.string: Bears are animals in the class of mammals belonging to the order Carnivora, family Ursidae.
The cheetah is a member of the cat family (Felidae) that hunts prey using speed rather than sneaking or flocking tactics.
The tiger (Panthera tigris) is the largest living cat species of the genus Panthera. Tigers have distinctive stripes on their fur.
panther is a subspecies of the leopard that is only found in tropical forests, mountains and conservation areas on the island of Java, Indonesia.
The lion (Sanskrit: Siá¹ƒha, or its scientific name Panthera leo) is a species of animal from the family Felidae or cat breed.
A CROCODILE is an animal that once lived alongside the dinosaurs, but survived the mass extinction and survived to modern times.
Sharks are a group (superorder Selachimorpha) of fish with a complete cartilaginous skeleton [1] and a slender body.
The stingray or peh fish is a type of marine fish that has 560 species and belongs to 13 families.
Whales or lodans (specifically toothed and not small) are a group of mammals that live in the oceans.
Jellyfish are jelly-shaped marine animals that are famous for their stings
